main.title: 5280 Storage Server
main.text: The 5280 Storage Server is a 4U, 2-socket storage server powered by Huaweiâ€™s 64-bit Kunpeng 920 CPU. The server provides a total of 128 cores running at 2.6 GHz and up to 560 TB of local storage.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
disk_node: Up to 40 x 3.5-inch SAS/SATA HDDs or SSDs,and 4 x 2.5-inch NVMeS SDs
raid_node: RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10, 50, or 60, supercapacitor for power failure protection</br>* The liquid-cooled TaiShan X6000 XA320 V2 supports only RAID 0, 1
pcie_node: Up to 8 PCIe 4.0 x8,or 3 PCIe 4.0 x16 + 2 PCIe 4.0 x8 slots
boardnic_node: 2 flexible LOM cards,supporting up to 8 x GE electrical ports, 8 x 25GE/10GE optical ports, or 4 x GE electrical ports + 4 x 25GE/10GE optical ports
power_node: 2 x 1500 W or 2000 W AC PSUs, hot-swap,1+1 redundancy
fan_node: 4 hot-swappable fan modules, supporting N+1 redundancy
